thread.title: Layne Christensen reports 2Q loss
thread.title_full: Layne Christensen reports 2Q loss - Yahoo Finance

author: yahoo
title: Layne Christensen reports 2Q loss
text:
THE WOODLANDS, Texas (AP) _ Layne Christensen Co. (LAYN) on Tuesday reported a loss of $18.2 million in its fiscal second quarter.
On a per-share basis, the The Woodlands, Texas-based company said it had a loss of 93 cents. Losses, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 35 cents per share.
The drilling and construction services provider posted revenue of $176.3 million in the period.
Layne Christensen shares have dropped 22 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $7.48, a decline of 32 percent in the last 12 months.
